txt.en: Harding gestures for you to sit at his right hand
This is a good place to sit
This is not where Harding wants you to sit
After helping out the people in and around Harwick, word has gotten back to Harding of your goodness, and he has called a council to hear of your deeds.

'I meant what I said, [placeholder]. I am truly sorry for my treatment of you when first we met.\n\n'My behaviour towards outsiders is always suspicious, and for that Harwick is safe, but I see that I close us off from good as well as evil.'
Harding holds his council in the upper level of the Mead Hall in Harwick.
'Ah! The [placeholder] of the hour. Please, take a seat at my right hand, and join your friends at my table. I am honoured to welcome you to my council, [placeholder].'

Harding holds his council in the upper level of the Mead Hall in Harwick.

You should <rgb=#FF0000>sit</rgb> in the chair to Harding's right.

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest requires that you perform an emote while in the appropriate place.</rgb>
Harding holds his council in the upper level of the Mead Hall in Harwick.
'TBD - Leave now.'
'All settled? Good. Let us begin.'
Harding holds his council in the upper level of the Mead Hall in Harwick.
'Shall we adjourn, [placeholder]? I am sure you have much to do here in town.'
Harding holds his council in the upper level of the Mead Hall in Harwick.
Speak with Harding
<rgb=#FF0000>Sit</rgb> at Harding's right hand
Tell Harding you are ready to begin
Observe Harding's council
Instance: Welcome to Harwick
Speak with Harding, Reeve of the Wold
